articles.author: Eustance Huang
articles.title: Australian stocks slip; major Asia markets closed for holidays - CNBC
articles.description: Markets in mainland China, Japan and South Korea are closed on Monday for a holiday.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Shares in Australia declined in Monday morning trade, with major markets in Asia closed for holidays.
The S&P/ASX 200 in Australia fell 1.29%, with shares of major miners declining: Ri… [+843 chars]

articles.title: Former Malaysia PM Najib may seek re-election to parliament despite conviction - AsiaOne
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia - Former Malaysian Prime Minister Najib Razak has not ruled out seeking re-election to parliament within the next two years, he told Reuters in an interview, undeterred by a corruption conviction that would block him from running. Najib…

articles.title: Younger, fully vaccinated Singapore Covid-19 patients told to recover at home amid strained hospitals - The Star Online
